name: Love Not War Mini Jam
description:
Game made years ago in a game jam.
The idea is you use love to pull the pistols away from the soldiers that attack you and turn them to hipsters xD or peaceful people. 

Controls:
WASD - Move

Hold Space Bar - Pull Weapon When In Range

Credits:

Nada Mahmoud - Artist
Hussien Hegazy - Artist
Mohamed Hamza - Developer
Abeer Ashraf - Developer Fahmy Hady - Developer
